alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake Valley; Bear River Range; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 1:13PM MST until January 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST MONDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches below 6500 feet MSL and 3 to 6 inches above 6500 feet. * WHERE...Malad Summit, Holbrook Summit, Treasureton Summit, Emigration Summit, Georgetown Summit, Geneva Summit, Border Summit, Malad, Preston, Thatcher, Emigration Summit, St. Charles, Montpelier, and Georgetown. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting 511.idaho.gov.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake Valley; Bear River Range; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region
